title: Illusions of reality
creator_contributor_role: Northern Virginia Community College. Extended Learning Institute, production company

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Photography - Social aspects - History
Crafts & Visual Arts/Photography - Social aspects - History
description: Episode number 6 of Series "The Developing image". Portrays the public's belief in the photograph and the ways that this trust has been manipulated over the years. Viewers explore photographs taken at the Battle of Gettysburg with a Civil War historian, while contemporary photographer Duane Michals, discusses illusion in his personal and commercial work.
related_objects: Series; S01210; The Developing image; Active; 1977
